quote: No one has ever become poor by giving
author: Anne Frank

quote: Everything has beauty but not everyone sees it
author: Confucius

quote: The mind is a wonderful servant but a terrible master
author: Robin Sharma

quote: Nothing will work unless you do
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Do not raise your voice improve your argument
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Our lives are like a candle in the wind
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Be a voice not an echo
author: Unknown

quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A friend is one who knows us but loves us anyway
author: Jerome Cummings

quote: Fate chooses our relatives We choose our friends
author: Jacques Delille

quote: A faithful friend is the medicine of life
author: Ecclesiasticus 6:16

quote: Impossible is for the unwilling
author: John Keats

quote: No pressure No diamonds
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: My life is my message
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: My life is my argument
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Broken crayons still color
author: Unknown

quote: Whatever you are be a good one
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If it matters to you You will find a way
author: Charlie Gilkey

quote: Whatever you do Do with all your might
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: If you are going through hell Keep going
author: Winston Churchill

quote: We are twice armed if we fight with faith
author: Plato

quote: The wisest mind has something yet to learn
author: George Santanaya

quote: Persistence guarantees that results are inevitable
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: In life you need either inspiration or desperation
author: Tony Robbins

quote: I would rather die on my feet than live on my knees
author: Euripides

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
author: Confucius

quote: It is better to live one day as a lion than a thousand days as a lamb
author: Roman proverb

quote: The two most important days in your life are the day you are born and they day you find out why
author: Mark Twain

quote: Each day provides its own gifts
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Nothing is worth more than this day
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Believe you can and you are halfway there
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You make mistakes Mistakes do not make you
author: Unknown

quote: Do not go through life Grow through life
author: Eric Butterworth

quote: What consumes your mind controls your life
author: Unknown

quote: The time is always right to do what is right
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: May your choices reflect your hopes not your fears
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Tough times never last but tough people do
author: Robert H. Schiuller

quote: Problems are not stop signs they are guidelines
author: Robert H. Schiuller

quote: Dream as if you’ll live forever live as if you’ll die today
author: James Dean

quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You only live once, but if you do it right once is enough
author: Mae West

quote: For every minute you are angry you lose sixty seconds of happiness
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you can not explain it to a six year old you do not understand it yourself
author: Albert Einstein
